response.overview: tells the story of the struggle of the dream girl Xia Yun, in the family, friendship driven by emotions, through unremitting efforts, overcoming difficulties and challenging self-limits, to become the champion of MMA stories. Chongqing maverick girl Xia Yun (Xia Jiao), in order to get rid of the difficulties in life, through perseverance to practice fighting, she meets her friend Zhang Ruoxuan (played by Bai Yao) , and joins hands to fight the game "black hand" gold boss (Lionel Roudaut) ), eventually won the MMA championship. Fighters Life is produced by Beijing Xiayun Tianxiang International Culture Media Co., Ltd., Hainan Shuanghou Technology Co., Ltd., Zhejiang Aiying Film and Television Culture Co., Ltd., Sichuan Chuanren Film and Television Culture Media Co., Ltd., and Xia Jiao is the main producer, Chief planner and producer, director Huang Bin, a women's inspirational action film starring Xia Jiao, Bai Yao, Chen Chen, Ouyang Huihui and others.
response.title: FIGHTERS LIFE
